thread.title: JKPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Civil Judge/ Munsiff Posts
thread.title_full: JKPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Civil Judge/ Munsiff Posts

author: publisher12
title: JKPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Civil Judge/ Munsiff Posts
text: 4. ST: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be 18- 35 years as on 01-01-2017. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Bachelor of Law of University/ Barrister of England Barrister of England or Northern Ireland or a member of the faculty of Advocates in Scotland or any other equivalent law degree recognized by the Government of India. Selection Process: Short listed candidates will be called for exam, interview. Examination Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 1005/- for General, Rs. 505/- for Reserved candidates through online challan to be deposited in the J&K Bank branch. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply through the website www.jkpsc.nic.in from 06-02-2017 to 06-03-2017 & send their hard copy of online application form along with photo copies of relevant certificates mentioned in the notification with application fee to the Shakeel Ul Rehman, Secretary & Controller of Examinations on or before 15-03-2017. Important Dates: Start Date to Apply Online: 06-02-2017 Last Date to Apply Online: 06-03-2017. Last Date for Depositing of Fee through Bank Challan: 10-03-2017 Last Date for Receipt of Hard Copy of Applications: 15-03-2017 For more details like centre of examination, reservation, pay scale & other information click on the link given below…
